thread.title: Larry Jacobson
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Larry Jacobson

author: Larry Jacobson
title: Larry Jacobson
text:
The website was great and they have lots of frames to choose from. This was my second pair I ordered on line. A week before I had ordered a pair of Burberrys from a competitor. But then using this website I 'just had to have' a pair of Oakley Carbon Plates, so I ordered those.
My only complaint with FramesDirect is their shipping. I ordered on 12/21/16, and they were shipped on 12/30 but didn't get here until 1/13/17!
Meanwhile, the competitor's order to delivery was less than two weeks and they used 2 or 3 day air. I would think when spending multi-hundreds of dollars on glasses, and with such a small shipping package, FramesDirect would include 2 or 3 day air - free.
Besides that issue, my glasses and lenses are perfect!
